performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Units/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: Number of automated tasks completed per hour, representing the overall processing capacity.  Dependent on task complexity and system architecture.

performance_metrics.name: Cycle Time (Seconds/Unit)
performance_metrics.description: Average time taken to complete a single automated task from start to finish.  Crucial for minimizing bottlenecks and optimizing overall efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Accuracy (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of units processed correctly, considering defect rates and error handling mechanisms. High reliability is paramount.

performance_metrics.name: Uptime (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of time the system is operational and available for processing.  Downtime should be minimized through redundancy and preventative maintenance.

performance_metrics.name: Energy Consumption (kWh/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: Energy usage during normal operation.  Efficiency is increasingly important for cost reduction and environmental sustainability.

performance_metrics.name: Processing Speed (IPS - Instructions Per Second)
performance_metrics.description: Rate at which the system can execute instructions. Influenced by processor speed, algorithm efficiency, and system architecture.

implementation_requirements.name: Integration with Existing Systems
implementation_requirements.specification: Seamless integration with ERP, MES, and warehouse management systems via API (RESTful or OPC UA). Data synchronization frequency: 1-5 Hz.
implementation_requirements.description: Critical for a holistic view of the production process and efficient data exchange.

implementation_requirements.name: Scalability
implementation_requirements.specification: Modular design with support for up to 500 units per line, expandable with additional processing modules.  Each module should accommodate 20-30 processing units.
implementation_requirements.description: System must be able to adapt to changing production demands.

implementation_requirements.name: Real-time Monitoring & Control
implementation_requirements.specification: Dedicated HMI (Human-Machine Interface) with data visualization, alarm management, and remote control capabilities.  Latency: <100ms.
implementation_requirements.description: Provides operators with immediate insight into system status and allows for manual intervention if needed.

implementation_requirements.name: Data Logging & Analytics
implementation_requirements.specification: Comprehensive data logging for all key performance indicators (KPIs), with a minimum retention period of 3 months.  Integration with business intelligence (BI) tools.
implementation_requirements.description: Enables data-driven decision-making and continuous improvement.

implementation_requirements.name: Safety Features
implementation_requirements.specification: Emergency stop systems, safety interlocks, and safety scanners conforming to IEC 61508 standards.  SIL rating of SIL 2 or higher.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures operator safety and prevents equipment damage.

implementation_requirements.name: Cybersecurity
implementation_requirements.specification: Implementation of ISO 27001 security protocols, including data encryption, access controls, and regular vulnerability assessments.
implementation_requirements.description: Protection against unauthorized access and data breaches.

operational_considerations: Operator training on system operation and troubleshooting.
Change management procedures for system modifications.
Process monitoring and data analysis to identify opportunities for optimization.
Defined downtime procedures and escalation paths.

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in industrial engineering and specifications. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of industrial/commercial specifications including performance metrics and implementation requirements. Be precise with numerical values and include ranges where appropriate. Focus on practical technical details that would be relevant to professionals in the field.
input.user_message:
Create detailed industrial specifications for: Requirements Automation

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. performance_metrics: An array of metrics with names, values/ranges, and descriptions
2. implementation_requirements: An array of requirements with names, specifications, and descriptions
3. industry_standards: An array of relevant standards and certifications
4. key_suppliers: An array of major equipment/technology suppliers for this industry
5. operational_considerations: An array of important operational factors

Please provide realistic values for industrial/commercial scale implementations.

Return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
